welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shoreham-by-Sea! This charming seaside town is known for its beautiful beaches, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the larger of the two terminals and serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves primarily domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
